full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I THUGS MCHOG NOR BU ZHES BYA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (ZHES DPAL MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO THUGS CHOG YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, TZA SAG AIL HU CHE MER GEN DAS CHEN MGON PO RDO RJE'I GRVA TSANG DGA' LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING GI THUGS RTEN BTZUGS PA'I SKABS, LHA BTZUN PI LIG THU SLOB DPON DGE SLONG SBYIN PA RGYAL MTSAN DANG, JA SAG NYID NAS LO RE BZHIN SGRUB MCHOD BSKUL BA' DGA' DON 'JUG PA BDE BA ZHIG DGOS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, RGYAL DBANG LNGA PAS MDZAD PA'I GUR GYI MGON PO LA SOGS PA'I CHOS SKYONG SRUNG MA'I RNAMS KYI THUGS CHOG DBANG DRAG ROL PAS GZHIR BYAS TE, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA BDAG CHEN PO'I BKA' CHING SU TZUG THU, NO MON HAN @015A *, ,ZHES BYA BA SNGAGS PA'I RDOR JE 'CHANG BLO BZANG NOR BU SHES RAB, DPAL BZANG PO YAB SRAS KYI BKA' DRIN GYI NYE BAR 'TSO BA DPAL MGON BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS THUGS RTEN GSAR 'DZUGS PA'I TSUL DU ZIL GNON ME RTA'I SA GA ZLA BA'I DKAR PO'I CHOS BCU LA JIR MA THA'I TSU TSAN KHAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GO ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: DPAL MGON BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN,
